title: Preferences: Likes (Usefulness 5-10)
description: Traveler usefulness 5-10/10 phrases for the Likes subcategory within Preferences. Includes 6 card(s).

cards.english: My favorite sushi is ikura (salmon roe).
cards.romaji: Watashi wa ikura no sushi ga ichiban suki da.
cards.japanese: 私はいまの寿司が一番好きだ。
